entities.name: irish supporters
entities.description: The Irish supporters are described as standing up in a great wave of green, indicating their enthusiasm and solidarity.

entities.name: ludo bagman
entities.description: Ludo Bagman's voice is magically magnified, showing his importance and influence in the scene.

entities.name: dimitrov
entities.description: Dimitrov is described as deliberately flying to collide with Moran, indicating his aggressive behavior.

entities.name: moran
entities.description: Moran is involved in a collision with Dimitrov, showing that he is also participating in the aggressive behavior.

entities.name: leprechauns
entities.description: The leprechauns are described as rising into the air and forming a giant hand, indicating their magical abilities.

entities.name: veela
entities.description: The veela are described as losing control and launching themselves across the field to attack the leprechauns, showing their aggressive behavior.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is watching the scene through his Omnioculars, indicating that he is observing and possibly commenting on the events.

relationships.description: Dimitrov deliberately flew to collide with Moran, resulting in a penalty.
The veela launched themselves across the field and began throwing handfuls of fire at the leprechauns.
